oneOf.title: v2_CompatibilityConfig
oneOf.description: The compatibility configuration of the Hasura metadata.

date.description: Any backwards incompatible changes made to Hasura DDN after this date won't impact the metadata.

oneOf.title: AuthConfig
oneOf.description: Definition of the authentication configuration used by the API server.

oneOf.title: AuthConfig1
oneOf.description: Definition of the authentication configuration v1, used by the API server.

definition.title: AuthConfigV1
definition.description: Definition of the authentication configuration v1, used by the API server.

mode.title: AuthModeConfig
mode.description: The configuration for the authentication mode to use - webhook, JWT or NoAuth.

webhook.title: AuthHookConfig
webhook.description: The configuration of the authentication webhook.

url.description: The URL of the authentication webhook.

method.description: The HTTP method to be used to make the request to the auth hook.

jwt.title: JWTConfig
jwt.description: JWT config according to which the incoming JWT will be verified and decoded to extract the session variable claims.

audience.description: Optional validation to check that the `aud` field is a member of the `audience` received, otherwise will throw error.

issuer.description: Optional validation to check that the `iss` field is a member of the `iss` received, otherwise will throw error.

allowedSkew.description: Allowed leeway (in seconds) to the `exp` validation to account for clock skew.

claimsConfig.description: Claims config. Either specified via `claims_mappings` or `claims_namespace_path`

allOf.title: JWTClaimsConfig
allOf.description: Config to describe how/where the engine should look for the claims within the decoded token.

locations.title: JWTClaimsMap
locations.description: Can be used when Hasura claims are not all present in the single object, but individual claims are provided a JSON pointer within the decoded JWT and optionally a default value.

x-hasura-default-role.description: JSON pointer to lookup the default role within the decoded JWT.

oneOf.description: Literal value of the claims mapping
Look up the Hasura claims at the specified JSON Pointer and provide a default value if the lookup fails.

path.title: JWTClaimsMappingPathEntry
path.description: Entry to lookup the Hasura claims at the specified JSON Pointer
JSON pointer to find the particular claim in the decoded JWT token.

default.description: Default value to be used when no value is found when looking up the value using the `path`.

x-hasura-allowed-roles.description: JSON pointer to lookup the allowed roles within the decoded JWT.

oneOf.description: Literal value of the claims mapping
Look up the Hasura claims at the specified JSON Pointer and provide a default value if the lookup fails.

path.title: JWTClaimsMappingPathEntry
path.description: Entry to lookup the Hasura claims at the specified JSON Pointer
JSON pointer to find the particular claim in the decoded JWT token.

default.description: Default value to be used when no value is found when looking up the value using the `path`.

namespace.title: JWTClaimsNamespace
namespace.description: Used when all of the Hasura claims are present in a single object within the decoded JWT.

claimsFormat.description: Format in which the Hasura claims will be present.

oneOf.description: Claims will be in the JSON format.
Claims will be in the Stringified JSON format.

location.description: Pointer to lookup the Hasura claims within the decoded claims.

tokenLocation.description: Source of the JWT authentication token.

allOf.title: JWTTokenLocation
allOf.description: Source of the Authorization token

oneOf.title: JWTBearerAuthorizationLocation
oneOf.description: Get the bearer token from the `Authorization` header.

oneOf.title: JWTCookieLocation
oneOf.description: Get the token from the Cookie header under the specified cookie name.

oneOf.title: JWTHeaderLocation
oneOf.description: Custom header from where the header should be parsed from.

key.description: Mode according to which the JWT auth is configured.

allOf.title: JWTKey
allOf.description: JWT key configuration according to which the incoming JWT will be decoded.

oneOf.description: JWT mode when the algorithm `type` and `key` is known

fixed.title: JWTKeyConfig
fixed.description: JWT Secret config according to which the incoming JWT will be decoded.

algorithm.description: The algorithm used to decode the JWT.

allOf.title: JWTAlgorithm
allOf.description: The algorithm used to decode the JWT.

oneOf.description: HMAC using SHA-256
HMAC using SHA-384
HMAC using SHA-512
ECDSA using SHA-256
ECDSA using SHA-384
RSASSA-PKCS1-v1_5 using SHA-256
RSASSA-PKCS1-v1_5 using SHA-384
RSASSA-PKCS1-v1_5 using SHA-512
RSASSA-PSS using SHA-256
RSASSA-PSS using SHA-384
RSASSA-PSS using SHA-512
Edwards-curve Digital Signature Algorithm (EdDSA)

key.description: The key to use for decoding the JWT.

oneOf.description: JWT mode where the `type` and `key` parameters are obtained dynamically through JWK.

noAuth.title: NoAuthConfig
noAuth.description: Configuration used when running engine without authentication

role.description: role to assume whilst running the engine

sessionVariables.title: SessionVariables
sessionVariables.description: static session variables to use whilst running the engine

additionalProperties.description: JSON value of a session variable

oneOf.title: AuthConfig2
oneOf.description: Definition of the authentication configuration v2, used by the API server.

definition.title: AuthConfigV2
definition.description: Definition of the authentication configuration v2, used by the API server.

oneOf.title: DataConnectorLink
oneOf.description: Definition of a data connector, used to bring in sources of data and connect them to OpenDD models and commands.

definition.title: DataConnectorLinkV1
definition.description: Definition of a data connector - version 1.

name.description: The name of the data connector.

allOf.title: DataConnectorName
allOf.description: The name of a data connector.

url.description: The url(s) to access the data connector.

allOf.title: DataConnectorUrlV1
allOf.description: A URL to access a data connector. This can be a single URL or a pair of read and write URLs.

readWriteUrls.title: ReadWriteUrls
readWriteUrls.description: A pair of URLs to access a data connector, one for reading and one for writing.

headers.description: Key value map of HTTP headers to be sent with each request to the data connector. This is meant for protocol level use between engine and the data connector.

allOf.title: HttpHeaders
allOf.description: Key value map of HTTP headers to be sent with an HTTP request. The key is the header name and the value is a potential reference to an environment variable.

schema.description: The schema of the data connector. This schema is used as the source of truth when serving requests and the live schema of the data connector is not looked up.

allOf.title: VersionedSchemaAndCapabilities
allOf.description: Versioned schema and capabilities for a data connector.

oneOf.title: SchemaAndCapabilitiesV01
oneOf.description: Version 0.1 of schema and capabilities for a data connector.

scalar_types.description: A list of scalar types which will be used as the types of collection columns

object_types.description: A list of object types which can be used as the types of arguments, or return types of procedures. Names should not overlap with scalar type names.

collections.description: Collections which are available for queries

functions.description: Functions (i.e. collections which return a single column and row)

procedures.description: Procedures which are available for execution as part of mutations

ScalarType.title: Scalar Type
ScalarType.description: The definition of a scalar type, i.e. types that can be used as the types of columns.

representation.description: A description of valid values for this scalar type. Defaults to `TypeRepresentation::JSON` if omitted

aggregate_functions.description: A map from aggregate function names to their definitions. Result type names must be defined scalar types declared in ScalarTypesCapabilities.

comparison_operators.description: A map from comparison operator names to their definitions. Argument type names must be defined scalar types declared in ScalarTypesCapabilities.

oneOf.description: JSON booleans
Any JSON string
Any JSON number
Any JSON number, with no decimal part
A 8-bit signed integer with a minimum value of -2^7 and a maximum value of 2^7 - 1
A 16-bit signed integer with a minimum value of -2^15 and a maximum value of 2^15 - 1
A 32-bit signed integer with a minimum value of -2^31 and a maximum value of 2^31 - 1
A 64-bit signed integer with a minimum value of -2^63 and a maximum value of 2^63 - 1
An IEEE-754 single-precision floating-point number
An IEEE-754 double-precision floating-point number
Arbitrary-precision integer string
Arbitrary-precision decimal string
UUID string (8-4-4-4-12)
ISO 8601 date
ISO 8601 timestamp
ISO 8601 timestamp-with-timezone
GeoJSON, per RFC 7946
GeoJSON Geometry object, per RFC 7946
Base64-encoded bytes
Arbitrary JSON
One of the specified string values

AggregateFunctionDefinition.title: Aggregate Function Definition
AggregateFunctionDefinition.description: The definition of an aggregation function on a scalar type

result_type.description: The scalar or object type of the result of this function

Type.title: Type
Type.description: Types track the valid representations of values as JSON

oneOf.description: A named type

name.description: The name can refer to a scalar or object type

oneOf.description: A nullable type

underlying_type.description: The type of the non-null inhabitants of this type

oneOf.description: An array type

element_type.description: The type of the elements of the array

oneOf.description: A predicate type for a given object type

ComparisonOperatorDefinition.title: Comparison Operator Definition
ComparisonOperatorDefinition.description: The definition of a comparison operator on a scalar type

argument_type.description: The type of the argument to this operator

ObjectType.title: Object Type
ObjectType.description: The definition of an object type

description.description: Description of this type

fields.description: Fields defined on this object type

ObjectField.title: Object Field
ObjectField.description: The definition of an object field

description.description: Description of this field

arguments.description: The arguments available to the field - Matches implementation from CollectionInfo

description.description: Argument description

type.description: The name of the type of this argument

name.description:
The name of the collection

Note: these names are abstract - there is no requirement that this name correspond to the name of an actual collection in the database.

description.description: Description of the collection

arguments.description: Any arguments that this collection requires

type.description: The name of the collection's object type

uniqueness_constraints.description: Any uniqueness constraints enforced on this collection

foreign_keys.description: Any foreign key constraints enforced on this collection

unique_columns.description: A list of columns which this constraint requires to be unique

column_mapping.description: The columns on which you want want to define the foreign key.

name.description: The name of the function

description.description: Description of the function

arguments.description: Any arguments that this collection requires

result_type.description: The name of the function's result type

name.description: The name of the procedure

description.description: Column description

arguments.description: Any arguments that this collection requires

result_type.description: The name of the result type

Capabilities.title: Capabilities
Capabilities.description: Describes the features of the specification which a data connector implements.

aggregates.description: Does the connector support aggregate queries

variables.description: Does the connector support queries which use variables

explain.description: Does the connector support explaining queries

nested_fields.description: Does the connector support nested fields

exists.description: Does the connector support EXISTS predicates

LeafCapability.description: A unit value to indicate a particular leaf capability is supported. This is an empty struct to allow for future sub-capabilities.

filter_by.description: Does the connector support filtering by values of nested fields

order_by.description: Does the connector support ordering by values of nested fields

aggregates.description: Does the connector support aggregating values within nested fields

transactional.description: Does the connector support executing multiple mutations in a transaction.

explain.description: Does the connector support explaining mutations

relation_comparisons.description: Does the connector support comparisons that involve related collections (ie. joins)?

order_by_aggregate.description: Does the connector support ordering by an aggregated array relationship?

argumentPresets.description: Argument presets that applies to all functions and procedures of this data connector. Defaults to no argument presets.

items.title: DataConnectorArgumentPreset
items.description: An argument preset that can be applied to all functions/procedures of a connector

argument.title: DataConnectorArgumentName
argument.description: The name of an argument as defined by a data connector.

value.title: DataConnectorArgumentPresetValue
value.description: The value of a data connector argument preset.

httpHeaders.description: HTTP headers that can be preset from request

allOf.title: HttpHeadersPreset
allOf.description: Configuration of what HTTP request headers should be forwarded to a data connector.

forward.description: List of HTTP headers that should be forwarded from HTTP requests

additional.description: Additional headers that should be forwarded, from other contexts

allOf.title: AdditionalHttpHeaders
allOf.description: Key value map of HTTP headers to be forwarded in the headers argument of a data connector request.

responseHeaders.description: HTTP response headers configuration that is forwarded from a data connector to the client.

anyOf.title: ResponseHeaders
anyOf.description: Configuration of what HTTP response headers should be forwarded from a data connector to the client in HTTP response.

headersField.description: Name of the field in the NDC function/procedure's result which contains the response headers

resultField.description: Name of the field in the NDC function/procedure's result which contains the result

allOf.title: DataConnectorColumnName
allOf.description: The name of a column in a data connector.

forwardHeaders.description: List of actual HTTP response headers from the data connector to be set as response headers

oneOf.title: GraphqlConfig
oneOf.description:
GraphqlConfig object tells us two things:

1. How the Graphql schema should look like for the features (`where`, `order_by` etc) Hasura provides 2. What features should be enabled/disabled across the subgraphs

definition.title: GraphqlConfigV1
definition.description:
GraphqlConfig object tells us two things:

1. How the Graphql schema should look like for the features (`where`, `order_by` etc) Hasura provides 2. What features should be enabled/disabled across the subgraphs

query.title: QueryGraphqlConfig
query.description: Configuration for the GraphQL schema of Hasura features for queries. `None` means disable the feature.

rootOperationTypeName.description: The name of the root operation type name for queries. Usually `query`.

anyOf.title: ArgumentsInputGraphqlConfig
anyOf.description: Configuration for the arguments input.

fieldName.description: The name of arguments passing field. Usually `args`.

anyOf.title: LimitInputGraphqlConfig
anyOf.description: Configuration for the limit operation.

fieldName.description: The name of the limit operation field. Usually `limit`.

anyOf.title: OffsetInputGraphqlConfig
anyOf.description: Configuration for the offset operation.

fieldName.description: The name of the offset operation field. Usually `offset`.

anyOf.title: FilterInputGraphqlConfig
anyOf.description: Configuration for the filter operation.

fieldName.description: The name of the filter operation field. Usually `where`.

operatorNames.description: The names of built-in filter operators.

allOf.title: FilterInputOperatorNames
allOf.description: The names of built-in filter operators.

and.description: The name of the `and` operator. Usually `_and`.

or.description: The name of the `or` operator. Usually `_or`.

not.description: The name of the `not` operator. Usually `_not`.

isNull.description: The name of the `is null` operator. Usually `_is_null`.

anyOf.title: OrderByInputGraphqlConfig
anyOf.description: Configuration for the sort operation.

fieldName.description: The name of the filter operation field. Usually `order_by`.

enumDirectionValues.description: The names of the direction parameters.

allOf.title: OrderByDirectionValues
allOf.description: The names of the direction parameters.

asc.description: The name of the ascending parameter. Usually `Asc`.

desc.description: The name of the descending parameter. Usually `Desc`.

items.title: OrderByEnumTypeName
items.description: Type name for a sort directions enum, with the given set of possible directions.

items.title: OrderByDirection
items.description: Sort direction.

oneOf.description: Ascending.
Descending.

anyOf.title: AggregateGraphqlConfig
anyOf.description: Configuration for the GraphQL schema for aggregates.

filterInputFieldName.description: The name of the filter input parameter of aggregate fields and field name in predicates

countFieldName.description: The name of the _count field used for the count aggregate function

countDistinctFieldName.description: The name of the _count_distinct field used for the count distinct aggregate function

mutation.title: MutationGraphqlConfig
mutation.description: Configuration for the GraphQL schema of Hasura features for mutations.

rootOperationTypeName.description: The name of the root operation type name for mutations. Usually `mutation`.

anyOf.title: SubscriptionGraphqlConfig
anyOf.description: Configuration for the GraphQL schema of Hasura features for subscriptions.

rootOperationTypeName.description: The name of the root operation type name for subscriptions. Usually `subscription`.

anyOf.title: GraphqlApolloFederationConfig
anyOf.description: Configuration for the GraphQL schema of Hasura features for Apollo Federation.

enableRootFields.description: Adds the `_entities` and `_services` root fields required for Apollo Federation.

oneOf.title: ObjectType
oneOf.description: Definition of a user-defined Open DD object type.

definition.name: Author

fields.name: first_name
fields.description: The first name of the author

fields.name: last_name
fields.description: The last name of the author

fields.name: biography
fields.description: AI generated biography for the author

arguments.name: ai_model
arguments.description: The AI model to use for generating the biography

definition.description: An author of a book

definition.title: ObjectTypeV1
definition.description: Definition of a user-defined Open DD object type.

name.description: The name to give this object type, used to refer to it elsewhere in the metadata. Must be unique across all types defined in this subgraph.

allOf.title: CustomTypeName
allOf.description: The name of a user-defined type.

fields.description: The list of fields defined for this object type.

items.title: ObjectFieldDefinition
items.description: The definition of a field in a user-defined object type.

name.description: The name of the field. This name is used both when referring to the field elsewhere in the metadata and when creating the corresponding GraphQl type.

type.description: The type of this field. This uses the GraphQL syntax to represent field types and must refer to one of the inbuilt OpenDd types or another user-defined type.

description.description: The description of this field. Gets added to the description of the field's definition in the graphql schema.

deprecated.description: Whether this field is deprecated. If set, the deprecation status is added to the field's graphql schema.

items.title: FieldArgumentDefinition
items.description: The definition of an argument for a field in a user-defined object type.

globalIdFields.description: The subset of fields that uniquely identify this object in the domain. Setting this property will automatically implement the GraphQL Relay Node interface for this object type and add an `id` global ID field. If setting this property, there must not be a field named `id` already present.

items.title: FieldName
items.description: The name of a field in a user-defined object type.

graphql.description: Configuration for how this object type should appear in the GraphQL schema.

anyOf.title: ObjectTypeGraphQLConfiguration
anyOf.description: GraphQL configuration of an Open DD object type.

typeName.description: The name to use for the GraphQL type representation of this object type when used in an output context.

inputTypeName.description: The name to use for the GraphQL type representation of this object type when used in an input context.

apolloFederation.description: Configuration for exposing apollo federation related types and directives.

anyOf.title: ObjectApolloFederationConfig
anyOf.description: Configuration for apollo federation related types and directives.

items.title: ApolloFederationObjectKey
items.description: The definition of a key for an apollo federation object.

description.description: The description of the object. Gets added to the description of the object's definition in the graphql schema.

dataConnectorTypeMapping.description: Mapping of this object type to corresponding object types in various data connectors.

items.title: DataConnectorTypeMapping
items.description: This defines the mapping of the fields of an object type to the corresponding columns of an object type in a data connector.

allOf.title: FieldMappings
allOf.description: Mapping of object fields to their source columns in the data connector.

oneOf.description: Source field directly maps to some column in the data connector.

column.title: ColumnFieldMapping
column.description: The target column in a data connector object that a source field maps to.

name.description: The name of the target column

oneOf.title: ScalarType
oneOf.description: Definition of a user-defined scalar type that that has opaque semantics.

definition.title: ScalarTypeV1
definition.description: Definition of a user-defined scalar type that that has opaque semantics.

name.description: The name to give this scalar type, used to refer to it elsewhere in the metadata. Must be unique across all types defined in this subgraph.

graphql.description: Configuration for how this scalar type should appear in the GraphQL schema.

anyOf.title: ScalarTypeGraphQLConfiguration
anyOf.description: GraphQL configuration of an Open DD scalar type

typeName.description: The name of the GraphQl type to use for this scalar.

description.description: The description of this scalar. Gets added to the description of the scalar's definition in the graphql schema.

oneOf.title: ObjectBooleanExpressionType
oneOf.description: Definition of a type representing a boolean expression on an Open DD object type.

definition.title: ObjectBooleanExpressionTypeV1
definition.description: Definition of a type representing a boolean expression on an Open DD object type. Deprecated in favour of `BooleanExpressionType`.

name.description: The name to give this object boolean expression type, used to refer to it elsewhere in the metadata. Must be unique across all types defined in this subgraph.

objectType.description: The name of the object type that this boolean expression applies to.

dataConnectorName.description: The data connector this boolean expression type is based on.

dataConnectorObjectType.description: The object type in the data connector's schema this boolean expression type is based on.

allOf.title: DataConnectorObjectType
allOf.description: The name of an object type in a data connector.

comparableFields.description: The list of fields of the object type that can be used for comparison when evaluating this boolean expression.

items.title: ComparableField
items.description: A field of an object type that can be used for comparison when evaluating a boolean expression.

items.title: OperatorName
items.description: The name of an operator

graphql.description: Configuration for how this object type should appear in the GraphQL schema.

anyOf.title: ObjectBooleanExpressionTypeGraphQlConfiguration
anyOf.description: GraphQL configuration of an Open DD boolean expression type.

typeName.description: The name to use for the GraphQL type representation of this boolean expression type.

oneOf.title: BooleanExpressionType
oneOf.description: Definition of a type representing a boolean expression on an OpenDD type.

definition.title: BooleanExpressionTypeV1
definition.description: Definition of a type representing a boolean expression on an OpenDD object type.

name.description: The name to give this boolean expression type, used to refer to it elsewhere in the metadata. Must be unique across all types defined in this subgraph.

operand.description: The type that this boolean expression applies to.

allOf.title: BooleanExpressionOperand
allOf.description: Configuration for object or scalar boolean expression

oneOf.title: Object
oneOf.description: Definition of a boolean expression on an OpenDD object type

object.title: BooleanExpressionObjectOperand
object.description: Definition of an object type representing a boolean expression on an OpenDD object type.

type.description: The name of the object type that this boolean expression applies to.

comparableFields.description: The list of fields of the object type that can be used for comparison when evaluating this boolean expression.

items.title: BooleanExpressionComparableField
items.description: Comparison configuration definition for a field that can be used for a comparison

fieldName.description: The name of the field that can be compared.

booleanExpressionType.description: The boolean expression type that can be used for comparison against the type of the field.

comparableRelationships.description: The list of relationships of the object type that can be used for comparison when evaluating this boolean expression.

items.title: BooleanExpressionComparableRelationship
items.description: Definition of a relationship that can be used for a comparison

relationshipName.description: The name of the relationship to use for comparison

booleanExpressionType.description: The boolean expression type to use for comparison. This is optional for relationships to models, and defaults to the filterExpressionType of the model

comparisonOperators.description: The list of comparison operators that can used on this scalar type

items.description: Definition of a comparison operator for a scalar type

name.description: Name you want to give the operator in OpenDD / GraphQL

dataConnectorOperatorMapping.description: The list of mappings between OpenDD operator names and the names used in the data connector schema

items.title: DataConnectorOperatorMapping
items.description: Mapping between OpenDD operator names and the names used in the data connector schema

dataConnectorName.description: Name of the data connector this mapping applies to

dataConnectorScalarType.description: Name of the scalar type according to the data connector's schema

operatorMapping.title: operator_mapping
operatorMapping.description: Mapping between OpenDD operator names and the data connector's operator names Defaults to the same operator name (e.g. "_eq: _eq") if no explicit mapping is present.

additionalProperties.title: DataConnectorOperatorName

allOf.title: BooleanExpressionLogicalOperators
allOf.description: Configuration for logical operators in boolean expressions

allOf.title: BooleanExpressionIsNull
allOf.description: Configuration for is_null in boolean expressions

graphql.description: Configuration for how this object type should appear in the GraphQL schema.

anyOf.title: BooleanExpressionTypeGraphQlConfiguration
anyOf.description: GraphQL configuration of an OpenDD boolean expression type.

typeName.description: The name to use for the GraphQL type representation of this boolean expression type.

scalar.title: ScalarAggregateOperand
scalar.description: Definition of an aggregate over a scalar-typed operand

items.description: Definition of an aggregation function

name.description: The name of the aggregation function

allOf.description: The name of an aggregation function.

description.description: A description of the aggregation function. Gets added to the description of the field in the GraphQL schema.

dataConnectorAggregationFunctionMapping.description: Mapping of aggregation functions to corresponding aggregation functions in various data connectors

items.title: DataConnectorAggregationFunctionMapping
items.description: Definition of how to map an aggregate expression's aggregation functions to data connector aggregation functions.

dataConnectorName.description: The data connector being mapped to

dataConnectorScalarType.description: The matching scalar type in the data connector for the operand scalar type

functionMapping.description: Mapping from Open DD aggregation function to data connector aggregation function

name.description: The name of the aggregation function in the data connector

allOf.title: DataConnectorAggregationFunctionName
allOf.description: The name of an aggregation function in a data connector

count.description: Configuration for the count aggregate function used over the operand

anyOf.title: AggregateCountDefinition
anyOf.description: Definition of a count aggregation function

enable.description: Whether or not the aggregate function is available for use or not

description.description: A description of the aggregation function. Gets added to the description of the field in the GraphQL schema.

countDistinct.description: Configuration for the count distinct aggregate function used over the operand

graphql.description: Configuration for how this command should appear in the GraphQL schema.

anyOf.title: AggregateExpressionGraphQlDefinition
anyOf.description: The definition of how an aggregate expression should appear in the GraphQL API.

selectTypeName.description: The type name to use for the aggregate selection type

deprecated.description: Whether this command root field is deprecated. If set, this will be added to the graphql schema as a deprecated field.

description.description: The description of the aggregate expression. Gets added to the description of the command's root field in the GraphQL schema.

oneOf.title: Model
oneOf.description: The definition of a data model. A data model is a collection of objects of a particular type. Models can support one or more CRUD operations.

definition.name: Articles

selectUniques.description: Description for the select unique ArticleByID

selectMany.description: Description for the select many ArticleMany

definition.description: Description for the model Articles

oneOf.title: Model1
oneOf.description: Definition of the data model v1.

definition.title: ModelV1
definition.description: The definition of a data model. A data model is a collection of objects of a particular type. Models can support one or more CRUD operations.

name.description: The name of the data model.

allOf.title: ModelName
allOf.description: The name of data model.

objectType.description: The type of the objects of which this model is a collection.

globalIdSource.description: Whether this model should be used as the global ID source for all objects of its type.

arguments.description: A list of arguments accepted by this model. Defaults to no arguments.

items.title: ArgumentDefinition
items.description: The definition of an argument for a field, command, or model.

name.title: ArgumentName
name.description: The name of an argument.

source.description: The source configuration for this model.

anyOf.title: ModelSource
anyOf.description: Description of how a model maps to a particular data connector

dataConnectorName.title: DataConnectorName
dataConnectorName.description: The name of the data connector backing this model.

collection.title: CollectionName
collection.description: The collection in the data connector that backs this model.

argumentMapping.description: Mapping from model argument names to data connector collection argument names.

allOf.title: ArgumentMapping
allOf.description: Mapping of a comand or model argument name to the corresponding argument name used in the data connector. The key of this object is the argument name used in the command or model and the value is the argument name used in the data connector.

filterExpressionType.description: The boolean expression type that should be used to perform filtering on this model.

orderableFields.description: A list of fields that can be used to order the objects in this model.

items.title: OrderableField
items.description: A field that can be used to order the objects in a model.

aggregateExpression.description: The name of the AggregateExpression that defines how to aggregate over this model

graphql.description: Configuration for how this model should appear in the GraphQL schema.

anyOf.title: ModelGraphQlDefinition
anyOf.description: The definition of how a model appears in the GraphQL API.

selectUniques.description: Description for the select unique ArticleByID

selectMany.description: Description for the select many ArticleMany

selectUniques.description: For each select unique defined here, a query root field is added to the GraphQL API that can be used to select a unique object from the model.

items.title: SelectUniqueGraphQlDefinition
items.description: The definition of the GraphQL API for selecting a unique row/object from a model.

queryRootField.description: The name of the query root field for this API.

uniqueIdentifier.description: A set of fields which can uniquely identify a row/object in the model.

description.description: The description of the select unique graphql definition of the model. Gets added to the description of the select unique root field of the model in the graphql schema.

deprecated.description: Whether this select unique query field is deprecated. If set, the deprecation status is added to the select unique root field's graphql schema.

subscription.description: Enable subscription on this select unique root field.

anyOf.title: SubscriptionGraphQlDefinition
anyOf.description: The definition of the GraphQL API for enabling subscription on query root fields.

rootField.description: The name of the subscription root field.

description.description: The description of the subscription graphql definition. Gets added to the description of the subscription root field in the graphql schema.

deprecated.description: Whether this subscription root field is deprecated. If set, the deprecation status is added to the subscription root field's graphql schema.

pollingIntervalMs.description: Polling interval in milliseconds for the subscription.

selectMany.description: Select many configuration for a model adds a query root field to the GraphQl API that can be used to retrieve multiple objects from the model.

anyOf.title: SelectManyGraphQlDefinition
anyOf.description: The definition of the GraphQL API for selecting rows from a model.

queryRootField.description: The name of the query root field for this API.

description.description: The description of the select many graphql definition of the model. Gets added to the description of the select many root field of the model in the graphql schema.

deprecated.description: Whether this select many query field is deprecated. If set, the deprecation status is added to the select many root field's graphql schema.

subscription.description: Enable subscription on this select many root field.

argumentsInputType.description: The type name of the input type used to hold the arguments of the model.

orderByExpressionType.description: The type name of the order by expression input type.

anyOf.title: ModelApolloFederationConfiguration
anyOf.description: Apollo Federation configuration for a model.

entitySource.description: Whether this model should be used as the source for fetching _entity for object of its type.

filterInputTypeName.description: The type name of the input type used to hold the filtering settings used by aggregates (etc) to filter their input before processing

aggregate.description: Configures the query root field added to the GraphQL API that can be used to aggregate over the model

anyOf.title: ModelAggregateGraphQlDefinition
anyOf.description: The definition of the GraphQL API for aggregating over a model.

queryRootField.description: The name of the query root field for this API.

description.description: The description of the aggregate graphql definition of the model. Gets added to the description of the aggregate root field of the model in the graphql schema.

deprecated.description: Whether this aggregate query field is deprecated. If set, the deprecation status is added to the aggregate root field's graphql schema.

subscription.description: Enable subscription on this aggregate root field.

description.description: The description of the model. Gets added to the description of the model in the graphql schema.

oneOf.title: Model2
oneOf.description: Definition of the data model v2.

definition.title: ModelV2
definition.description: The definition of a data model. A data model is a collection of objects of a particular type. Models can support one or more CRUD operations. ModelV2 implements the changes described in rfcs/open-dd-expression-type-changes.md.

name.description: The name of the data model.

objectType.description: The type of the objects of which this model is a collection.

globalIdSource.description: Whether this model should be used as the global ID source for all objects of its type.

arguments.description: A list of arguments accepted by this model. Defaults to no arguments.

source.description: The source configuration for this model.

filterExpressionType.description: The boolean expression type that should be used to perform filtering on this model.

orderByExpression.description: The order by expression to use for this model.

aggregateExpression.description: The name of the AggregateExpression that defines how to aggregate over this model

graphql.description: Configuration for how this model should appear in the GraphQL schema.

anyOf.title: ModelGraphQlDefinitionV2
anyOf.description: The definition of how a model appears in the GraphQL API. Note: ModelGraphQlDefinitionV2 removed the `order_by_expression_type` property. See rfcs/open-dd-expression-type-changes.md.

selectUniques.description: Description for the select unique ArticleByID

selectMany.description: Description for the select many ArticleMany

selectUniques.description: For each select unique defined here, a query root field is added to the GraphQL API that can be used to select a unique object from the model.

selectMany.description: Select many configuration for a model adds a query root field to the GraphQl API that can be used to retrieve multiple objects from the model.

argumentsInputType.description: The type name of the input type used to hold the arguments of the model.

filterInputTypeName.description: The type name of the input type used to hold the filtering settings used by aggregates (etc) to filter their input before processing

aggregate.description: Configures the query root field added to the GraphQL API that can be used to aggregate over the model

description.description: The description of the model. Gets added to the description of the model in the graphql schema.

oneOf.title: Command
oneOf.description: The definition of a command. A command is a user-defined operation which can take arguments and returns an output. The semantics of a command are opaque to the Open DD specification.

definition.name: get_latest_article
definition.description: Get the latest article

definition.title: CommandV1
definition.description: Definition of an OpenDD Command, which is a custom operation that can take arguments and returns an output. The semantics of a command are opaque to OpenDD.

name.description: The name of the command.

allOf.title: CommandName
allOf.description: The name of a command.

outputType.description: The return type of the command.

allOf.title: TypeReference
allOf.description:
A reference to an Open DD type including nullable values and arrays.
Suffix '!' to indicate a non-nullable reference, and wrap in '[]' to indicate an array.
Eg: '[String!]!' is a non-nullable array of non-nullable strings.

arguments.description: The list of arguments accepted by this command. Defaults to no arguments.

source.description: The source configuration for this command.

anyOf.title: CommandSource
anyOf.description: Description of how a command maps to a particular data connector

dataConnectorName.description: The name of the data connector backing this command.

dataConnectorCommand.description: The function/procedure in the data connector that backs this command.

oneOf.title: Function
oneOf.description: A function as data connector command.

function.title: FunctionName
function.description: The name of a function backing the command.

oneOf.title: Procedure
oneOf.description: A procedure as data connector command.

procedure.title: ProcedureName
procedure.description: The name of a procedure backing the command.

argumentMapping.description: Mapping from command argument names to data connector function or procedure argument names.

graphql.description: Configuration for how this command should appear in the GraphQL schema.

anyOf.title: CommandGraphQlDefinition
anyOf.description: The definition of how a command should appear in the GraphQL API.

rootFieldName.description: The name of the graphql root field to use for this command.

allOf.title: GraphQlFieldName
allOf.description: The name of a GraphQL object field.

rootFieldKind.description: Whether to put this command in the Query or Mutation root of the GraphQL API.

deprecated.description: Whether this command root field is deprecated. If set, this will be added to the graphql schema as a deprecated field.

description.description: The description of the command. Gets added to the description of the command's root field in the GraphQL schema.

oneOf.title: Relationship
oneOf.description: Definition of a relationship on an OpenDD type which allows it to be extended with related models or commands.

definition.name: Articles
definition.description: Articles written by an author

definition.title: RelationshipV1
definition.description: Definition of a relationship on an OpenDD type which allows it to be extended with related models or commands.

name.description: The name of the relationship.

allOf.title: RelationshipName
allOf.description: The name of the GraphQL relationship field.

sourceType.description: The source type of the relationship.

allOf.title: RelationshipTarget
allOf.description: The target for a relationship.

model.title: ModelRelationshipTarget
model.description: The target model for a relationship.

name.description: The name of the data model.

subgraph.description: The subgraph of the target model. Defaults to the current subgraph.

relationshipType.description: Type of the relationship - object or array.

allOf.title: RelationshipType
allOf.description: Type of the relationship.

oneOf.description: Select one related object from the target.
Select multiple related objects from the target.

aggregate.description: How to aggregate over the relationship. Only valid for array relationships

anyOf.title: ModelRelationshipTargetAggregate
anyOf.description: Which aggregate expression to use to aggregate the array relationship.

aggregateExpression.description: The name of the aggregate expression that defines how to aggregate across the relationship.

description.description: The description of the relationship aggregate. Gets added to the description of the aggregate field in the GraphQL schema

command.title: CommandRelationshipTarget
command.description: The target command for a relationship.

name.description: The name of the command.

subgraph.description: The subgraph of the target command. Defaults to the current subgraph.

mapping.description: The mapping configuration of source to target for the relationship.

items.title: RelationshipMapping
items.description: Definition of a how a particular field in the source maps to a target field or argument.

source.description: The source configuration for this relationship mapping.

allOf.title: RelationshipMappingSource
allOf.description: The source configuration for a relationship mapping.

value.title: ValueExpression
value.description: An expression which evaluates to a value that can be used in permissions and various presets.

items.title: RelationshipSourceFieldAccess
items.description: A field access in a relationship mapping.

target.description: The target configuration for this relationship mapping.

allOf.title: RelationshipMappingTarget
allOf.description: The target configuration for a relationship mapping.

argument.title: ArgumentMappingTarget
argument.description: An argument target for a relationship mapping.

description.description: The description of the relationship. Gets added to the description of the relationship in the graphql schema.

deprecated.description: Whether this relationship is deprecated. If set, the deprecation status is added to the relationship field's graphql schema.

anyOf.title: Deprecated
anyOf.description: OpenDd configuration to indicate whether an object type field, relationship, model root field or command root field is deprecated.

graphql.description: Configuration for how this relationship should appear in the GraphQL schema.

anyOf.title: RelationshipGraphQlDefinition
anyOf.description: The definition of how a relationship appears in the GraphQL API

aggregateFieldName.description: The field name to use for the field that represents an aggregate over the relationship

oneOf.title: TypePermissions
oneOf.description: Definition of permissions for an OpenDD type.

definition.title: TypePermissionsV1
definition.description: Definition of permissions for an OpenDD type.

typeName.description: The name of the type for which permissions are being defined. Must be an object type.

permissions.description: A list of type permissions, one for each role.

items.title: TypePermission
items.description: Defines permissions for a particular role for a type.

role.description: The role for which permissions are being defined.

output.description: Permissions for this role when this type is used in an output context. If null, this type is inaccessible for this role in an output context.

anyOf.title: TypeOutputPermission
anyOf.description: Permissions for a type for a particular role when used in an output context.

allowedFields.description: Fields of the type that are accessible for a role

input.description: Permissions for this role when this type is used in an input context. If null, this type is accessible for this role in an input context.

anyOf.title: TypeInputPermission
anyOf.description: Permissions for a type for a particular role when used in an input context.

fieldPresets.description: Preset values for fields of the type

items.title: FieldPreset
items.description: Preset value for a field

oneOf.title: ModelPermissions
oneOf.description: Definition of permissions for an OpenDD model.

definition.title: ModelPermissionsV1
definition.description: Definition of permissions for an OpenDD model.

modelName.description: The name of the model for which permissions are being defined.

permissions.description: A list of model permissions, one for each role.

items.title: ModelPermission
items.description: Defines the permissions for an OpenDD model.

role.description: The role for which permissions are being defined.

select.description: The permissions for selecting from this model for this role. If this is null, the role is not allowed to query the model.

anyOf.title: SelectPermission
anyOf.description: Defines the permissions for selecting a model for a role.

filter.description: Filter expression when selecting rows for this model. Null filter implies all rows are selectable.

anyOf.title: ModelPredicate
anyOf.description: A predicate that can be used to restrict the objects returned when querying a model.

oneOf.description: Filters objects based on a field value.

fieldComparison.title: FieldComparisonPredicate
fieldComparison.description: Field comparison predicate filters objects based on a field value.

field.description: The field name of the object type of the model to compare.

operator.description: The name of the operator to use for comparison.

value.description: The value expression to compare against.

fieldIsNull.title: FieldIsNullPredicate
fieldIsNull.description: Predicate to check if the given field is null.

field.description: The name of the field that should be checked for a null value.

oneOf.description: Filters objects based on the relationship of a model.

relationship.title: RelationshipPredicate
relationship.description: Relationship predicate filters objects of a source model based on a predicate on the related model.

name.description: The name of the relationship of the object type of the model to follow.

predicate.description: The predicate to apply on the related objects. If this is null, then the predicate evaluates to true as long as there is at least one related object present.

oneOf.title: And
oneOf.description: Evaluates to true if all sub-predicates evaluate to true.

oneOf.title: Or
oneOf.description: Evaluates to true if any of the sub-predicates evaluate to true.

oneOf.title: Not
oneOf.description: Evaluates to true if the sub-predicate evaluates to false.

argumentPresets.description: Preset values for arguments for this role

allowSubscriptions.description: Whether the role is allowed to subscribe to the root fields of this model.

oneOf.title: CommandPermissions
oneOf.description: Definition of permissions for an OpenDD command.

definition.title: CommandPermissionsV1
definition.description: Definition of permissions for an OpenDD command.

commandName.description: The name of the command for which permissions are being defined.

permissions.description: A list of command permissions, one for each role.

items.title: CommandPermission
items.description: Defines the permissions for a role for a command.

role.description: The role for which permissions are being defined.

allowExecution.description: Whether the command is executable by the role.

argumentPresets.description: Preset values for arguments for this role

items.title: ArgumentPreset
items.description: Preset value for an argument

allOf.title: ValueExpressionOrPredicate
allOf.description: An expression which evaluates to a value that can be used in permissions and various presets.

sessionVariable.description: Used to represent the name of a session variable, like "x-hasura-role".

allOf.description: Configuration for a lifecycle plugin hook.

allOf.description: Configuration for a lifecycle plugin hook request.

anyOf.title: LifecyclePluginHookHeadersConfig
anyOf.description: Configuration for a lifecycle plugin hook headers.

additional.description: Additional headers to be sent with the request.

forward.description: Headers to be forwarded from the incoming request.

session.description: Configuration for the session (includes roles and session variables).
